Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Harrison
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Harrison due to an injured customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Harrison due to an injured customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
